text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Trainer...
choice_data_list: Do you think you're up to racing today?
Do you think you're up to racing today?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I-I'm so sorry. I'm really, really,really sorry!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I just... I'm so... so sorry!
choice_data_list: There's no need to apologize.
There's no need to apologize.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Why?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Why are you so nice to me, Trainer?<n>I... I don't deserve your
kindness.
choice_data_list: Yes you do, Rice. No doubt about it.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: No, I don't! I'm... I'm hopeless,<n>worthless—useless!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...I tried to change myself, you know.<n>Not just this time... so
many times.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
It was hard moving away from<n>Mother, but I still came to
Tracen<n>Academy. I trained so much, and I<n>even signed up
for races!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But... it was no good. Whenever I<n>think about running in an
actual race, I<n>get so scared... Like at the tryouts,<n>like now!
choice_data_list: What are you afraid of?
What are you afraid of?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: That I'll never become a blue rose.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
That even if I enter a race, I won't be<n>able to make even a
single person<n>happy.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
That once I run, I'll find out the<n>truth—that I'm a
good-for-nothing... Not<n>just now, but forever after too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
When I think about all that... I get so<n>scared, and I can't stop
trembling!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, Trainer. You don't need to<n>put up with me... You
shouldn't put up<n>with me anymore!
choice_data_list: So you want to change yourself that badly...
So you want to change yourself that badly...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh?
choice_data_list:
You're scared, but you don't want to give up,
do you?

You're scared, but you don't want to give up,
do you?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: W-well... But...
choice_data_list:
As long as you haven't given up, I won't give up
on you.

As long as you haven't given up, I won't give up
on you.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You'll stay by my side no matter<n>what? You believe... that I
can still<n>change?
choice_data_list: I'll be waiting for you at the racecourse, Rice!
I'll be waiting for you at the racecourse, Rice!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hm, hm, hm, hmmm! Hm, hm, hmmm!<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You can do this, Rice! Believe in<n>yourself...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ah, Rice! You came out!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah! Urara, you waited for me this<n>whole time?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Yup! Rice, are you gonna race? Then<n>I'll be cheering for
you! You can do it,<n>Riiice!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Urara... Yeah! Thank you...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I can do this—yeah!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Exhale...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
(My legs... and my hands... they're<n>still shaking. And my
fingers are ice<n>cold!)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (But—)
choice_data_list: Rice!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Um... Well, um, I—
choice_data_list: Rice, it's your turn to bloom!
Rice, it's your turn to bloom!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Right. Here... I go!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (I... I hate myself.)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
(All I do is bring misfortune upon<n>others and cause trouble.
For as long<n>as I can remember, I've hated<n>myself.)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (But maybe now...)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And they round the third turn! Running<n>up from the outside,
it's the jet-black<n>racer—Rice Shower!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (I will change! I won't giveup! I won't be the same, weak girlany longer—never again!)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
(Because even I... can bloom into a<n>beautiful blue rose that
brings people<n>happiness!)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
200 meters left until the finish line,<n>and Rice Shower leads
the pack! It's a<n>fierce fight for first on this final<n>stretch!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: 100 meters remaining! Who will<n>emerge victorious?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I will... become the me I've always<n>wanted to beeeee!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Finish! A fierce battle, but Rice<n>Shower takes the title! A
round of<n>applause for your winner, Rice<n>Shower!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Yeaaaaah!!! Woooo!!!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Nice goin', Rice Shower! Now that's<n>what I call a good race!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
I was on the edge of my seat! I'll<n>come to your next race
for sure!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer... Um, can I make a selfish<n>request?
choice_data_list: A request?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Mhm. Um, well...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'd really like... to call you Big Brother.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'd really like... to call you Big Sister.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Would that be... okay?
choice_data_list: If that's what you want, go for it.
If that's what you want, go for it.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Really?! Th-then!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I... I really want to keep training with<n>you...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Big Brother!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Big Sister!
